thread.title: The top 10 audiobooks on Audible.com
thread.title_full: The top 10 audiobooks on Audible.com - The Denver Post

author: The Associated Press
title: The top 10 audiobooks on Audible.com
text:
Audible.com best-sellers for week ending July 31, 2015:
Fiction
1. Go Set A Watchman by Harper Lee, narrated by Reese Witherspoon (Harper Audio)
2. The Martian by Andy Weir, narrated by B.C. Bray (Podium Publishing)
3. The Accidental Alchemist by Gigi Pandian, narrated by Julia Motyka (Audible Studios)
4. The Girl on the Train by Paula Hawkins, narrated by Clare Corbett, Louis Brealey and India Fisher (Penguin Audio)
5. Three: Legends of the Duskwalker, Book 1 by Jay Posey, narrated by Luke Daniels (Angry Robot on Brilliance Audio)
6. The Magician's Lie by Greer Macallister, narrated by Julia Whelan and Nick Podehl (Brilliance Audio)
7. Treasure Island by Robert Louis Stevenson, narrated by Neil Hunt (Recorded Books)
8. Trust No One by Jayne Anne Krentz, narrated by Amanda Cobb (Recorded Books)
9. Grey: Fifty Shades of Grey as told by Christian by E.L. James, narrated by Zachary Webber (Random House Audio)
10.To Kill A Mockingbird by Harper Lee, narrated by Sissy Spacek (Harper Audio)
Nonfiction
1. Being Human: Life Lessons from the Frontiers of Science by Robert Sapolsky, narrated by the author (The Great Courses)
2. Modern Romance: An Investigation by Aziz Ansari and Eric Klinenberg, narrated by the authors (Penguin Audio)
